TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute Inherits AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加屬性僅供衍生自指定類型的項目瀏覽。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詞彙的意義`browsable`用於描述這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]相當於指定的描述，附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態和屬性資訊的特別無關，但[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，因為附加的屬性是主要[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 如果指定一個以上的型別 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，屬性是可瀏覽，如果任何指定的型別相符項目 (邏輯或)。If more than one type is specified for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or). 型別也可以是介面。The type can also be an interface. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定 `true`。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies `true`. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]只會套用在定義附加的屬性的 get 存取子。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 不套用此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set 存取子。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 雖然直覺的方式設定作業正在進行可瀏覽的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]上相關的項目，它是目前狀態和屬性定義控制，則為 true 的行為項目上的 get 存取子的特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 如需宣告的附加屬性的一般資訊，請參閱[附加屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作支援的一個可能的可設定值由這個實值相等[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

summary.span: 傳回這個 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

returns.span: 32 位元不帶正負號的整數值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作支援這所公開的一個可能可設定值為基礎的多個可能的雜湊值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

summary.span: 取得基底類型，限定套用了這個 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 之附加屬性的使用範圍。

span.span: Gets the base type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是可設定只能透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]宣告所公開之建構函式。This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the constructor.

summary.span: 取得此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的唯一類型識別項。

span.span: Gets a unique type identifier for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

value.span: 一種物件，為 的唯一識別項。

span.span: An object that is a unique identifier for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作會傳回唯一值，每個[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，這是必要條件因為這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]可讓多個使用方式。This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
